word: ON ONE OCCASION SHE MENTIONED A SCENE THAT HAD PASSED BEFORE HER OF A VILLAGE LOCATED IN THE VALLEY, AND SERIOUS DIFFICULTIES COMING TO THE WORK. AT ANOTHER TIME SHE MENTIONED THAT SOME OF OUR AGED PEOPLE WOULD WANT TO MAKE THEIR HOME HERE, AND SHE SUGGESTED THAT SUITABLE ONES MIGHT BE PERMITTED TO BUILD WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THE BUILDINGS WOULD BE LEFT TO THE INSTITUTION.
